list.name: Default
list.comment: removed GSON and now using Jackson + better design of the manifests

task.summary: Default task
renamed sos-storage to sos-data-storage
major project refactoring
First Commit - storage-sta provides a storage abstraction over a local fs, aws s3 and a network mounted drive. This utility is inspired by the work of Al Dearle and Graham Kirby on the ASA project
using storage-sta module
adding missing files and references
interim - using separate interfaces for Client, Storage, Coordinator
interim: removing old Configuration code (still not working)
rewrote SOSURLConnection to use storage-sta utility (working for local files only for the moment being) + fixed some other minor issues
removed any SOS specific code + added remove directory for FileBased impl
wrapping storage-sta with InternalStorage class + removing any File.io code
fixed bug with backup file not being deleted correctly
make use of the InternalStorage in the index
All tests in sos-core are passing + some project files added
disabled aws test
packaging - jar
reworking classes, interfaces and packages
started working on a new set of interfaces for data searching and configuration modularity
builder pattern for SOSLocalNode construction + DB abstraction (work in progress)
Abstract db management
Jetty App + removed old REST project + removed war packaging in nmr-rest
better exception handling
better exception handling
sos-rest updated server state to handle new exceptions
renaming sos-rest and sos-rest-grizzly modules
interim - working on the SOS FS for webdav
more tests
additional tests
a first definition of the ReplicationPolicy + refined the interfaces for client, storage, coordinator
documentation + metadata engine + (WORK IN PROGRESS) use of builders when adding stuff in the SOS
BasicReplicationPolicy tests
ManifestPolicy + tests
Configuration via java properties + tests + removed legacy dependency on sos-rest-jetty
more tests on the Configuration
isInvalid method on key
using commons-configuration2 + changed the Pub-Priv key code (should be more solid now)
working on the new REST interfaces
working REST APIs for Storage: get data by GUID and put data by location
using jackson with jersey + setting user-agent on HTTP requests for URI locations
better Responses handling
moved IKey out of the impl/ folder + more complete README with examples
authors and maintainer
using jersey filter to check if node is a storage node, before the request is being processed
Coordinator --> DiscoveryData + added DiscoveryNode role

make default configuration
Just need to run: java -jar sos-configuration.jar default
or java -jar sos-configuration.jar default PATH
interim - better configuration template formatting
URI getSource for file, http and https schemes
interim: DiscoveryNode --> DNS, trying to work out the API for Storage
intellij files
